content: I'm excited to see https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/9417 get merged. It's a nice step toward having a containerized dev environment. It allows us to have Postgres, Solr, and an SMTP service in containers.

Just in, a testimonial:

"I got my loaner laptop setup with Dataverse, using the Dockerized Dataverse services from the PR, it worked very nicely :blush:"
Oliver Bertuch has marked this topic as resolved.
